sentences.sContent: They may be pushing the president toward a final showdown with his party.
sentences.sCn: 他们可能会逼迫总统与其政党做最后的较量。

synos.tran: 摊牌；紧要关头；最后一决胜负

trans.tranCn: 摊牌；紧要关头；最后一决胜负
trans.tranOther: a meeting, argument, fight etc that will settle a disagreement or competition that has continued for a long time
